short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on Hackage, Hoogle and more soon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Haskell Spotlight you can do search on Hackage and Hoogle without switching context to another tab.

If you enjoy it, please:

- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HaskellSpot
- Star us on GitHub https://github.com/haskell-spotlight/haskell-spotlight
- Take a look at http://haskellspot.com/

If you found any bugs, report here: https://github.com/haskell-spotlight/haskell-spotlight/issues
